channel.title: - Skylark Pictures; free short films with a little something for everyone
channel.description: Free Short Films, SNLish comedy, political satire, quirky flicks and dark drama for your Ipod Video and Computer from skylarkpictures.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Want Free Short Films for your Ipod Video and Computer? Look no further.
channel.itunes:summary: Free Comedy Short Films for your for your Ipod Video and Computer from independent film maker, indie film enthusiast Mike Hobbs; founder of skylarkpictures.com.
channel.itunes:keywords: comedy, humor, short films, ipod video, ifilm.com, independent film, student film, hobbs, Mike Hobbs, Skylark Pictures, indie
channel.itunes:author: Skylark Pictures (mike@skylarkpictures.com)

image.title: - Free Short Films and Videos from Skylark Pictures

item.title: Bob
item.description:
Are you lonely? Do you wish you had a pet but just cant seem to keep one alive long enough to enjoy it? Well you are in luck!
Copyright Skylark Pictures 2005
mike@skylarkpictures.com
item.author: mike@skylarkpictures.com

item.title: Three Me
item.description:
Arguing with ones-self is often futile... and sometimes deadly.
Copyright Skylark Pictures 2005
mike@skylarkpictures.com

item.title: COMMI$$ION
item.description:
Ever wonder what the used car sales man is really thinking? Just keep watching...

item.title: I-9
item.description:

mike@skylarkpictures.com

item.title: The Blow Out
item.description:
Old west showdown meets modern industrial cleanup

item.title: Hobbs
item.description:
A story of love, loss, dispair, and death.
Have you ever loved and lost? What if losing everything meant finding yourself...
Copyright Skylark Pictures 2005
mike@skylarkpictures.com
item.author: mike@skylarkpictures.com

item.title: Deep Sea Station 3000
item.description:
Do you love classic SNL? Is slapstick your thing? Are aliens really the dominant lifeform here on Earth? Stay tuned...
Copyright Skylark Pictures 2005
mike@skylarkpictures.com
item.author: mike@skylarkpictures.com

item.title: Capitalize
item.description:
In a world of success and smiles, sometimes the means to the end is not what you would expect.
Copyright Skylark Pictures 2005
mike@skylarkpictures.com
item.author: mike@skylarkpictures.com

item.title: Team Enid 0705
item.description:
Featured video #1 on Skylark Pictures! This is a spoof of Team America, and was modified from the original, filmed, and directed by a couple of guys at Air Force Pilot training. Awesome footage and inventive filming, directing, and producing techniques.
Copyright Skylark Pictures 2005
mike@skylarkpictures.com
item.author: mike@skylarkpictures.com

item.title: The Plagiarist
item.description:
“The Plagiarist ” is a tale rich in symbolism and emotion. The film is intended to make one question motives and friendship while never losing sight of the issues at hand.
Copyright Skylark Pictures 2005
mike@skylarkpictures.com
item.author: mike@skylarkpictures.com

item.title: Echo
item.description:
Thanks to Melvin Kwok for submitting this excellent skate video, "Echo"! This video is a lovingly shot tribute to the Indiana skating scene.
Copyright Skylark Pictures 2005
mike@skylarkpictures.com
item.author: mike@skylarkpictures.com

item.title: Bathing In Mung
item.description:
Bathing in Mung is the new music video from the band Butterfist. The song and the video are based on the legend of 'The Munion Hunter'. Watch it, then check out more on the urban legend of the Munion Hunter mungspace.com. Join us in the search!
Copyright Skylark Pictures 2006
mike@skylarkpictures.com
item.author: mike@skylarkpictures.com
